OM_Shadowheart_AOM.synopsis: Avatar Shadowheart wakes up and recalls her mission in brief. She retrieves the Astal prism (mystery artefact) or has it forced onto her.
OM_Shadowheart_AOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Play Avatar Shadowheart2. Start the game3. Wake up in the tutorial

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_1.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_1.text: *Your mind reels, stomach churns, legs struggle to find their footing. Fire and chaos assail every sense.*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar Shadowheart comes to on the floor of the nautiloid by her open pod. She stands, dazed, she tries to steady herself.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_0.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_0.text: *You shut your eyes. In the dark, Lady Shar can guide you.*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar Shadowheart closes her eyes and breathes, trying to clear her mind.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_5.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_5.text: *The mission. The artefact. Many were sent to retrieve it, and now only you remain. You must survive, and bring it to Baldur's Gate. To the Mother Superior.*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH has her eyes closed. When the mission comes back to her, her eyes snap open in realisation. She turns around and sees the artefact, fallen onto the floor next to her pod.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar Shadowheart reaches down and picks up the artefact. She lifts it out and looks at it.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_2.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_2.text: *Such an insignificant-seeming item. You know nothing of its purpose - only that you must protect it with your life.*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar SH puts the artefact away out of frame.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_3.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_3.text: You need to get out of here. Back away.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH backs away from the pod - only for the box to levitate up and shoot into her hands. She looks at it in astonishment.

OM_Shadowheart_AOM_8.speaker: Narrator
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_8.text: *Your mission is not so easily abandoned. What strange powers does this artefact lay claim to...?*
OM_Shadowheart_AOM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Avatar SH puts the artefact away out of frame.
